nodes.text: An individual served as the Sith apprentice of the Twi'lek Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Gean. At some point after Gean killed her Sith Master, Darth Gravid, around 552 BBY, the Sith apprentice was selected by Darth Gean in order to continue the lineage instituted by Darth Bane in 1000 BBY.
The apprentice's only mention in Star Wars canon was in James Luceno's novel Darth Plagueis, released on January 10, 2012.
